page.title: 03 TYNE AND WEAR METRO.
page.content: The Metro is an advanced electric - powered train.It works on two separate lines with over head cables.To obtain a ticket you enter the train and select the destination from the issuing machine.The fare charge appears on the digital display.Under 14 years old select the reduced fare button and pay five pence for all journeys.The customer then passes through the barrier pushing the ticket through the electronic checking device .The Metro is part of a large networK integrating buses and using special transfare tickets to provide an efficient,clean integrating buses and using special transfare tickets to provide an efficient,clean service.49.5 million people travel by Metro each year;the total workforce is 642 people, 170 of them are drivers and approximately 112,000 pounds are
